A4.text: Although uncredited, Jones's voice is possibly heard as Darth Vader at the conclusion of Star Wars: Episode III â€“ Revenge of the Sith (2005).

A5.text: David Prowse was portrayed in costume by David Prowse in the film trilogy, with Jones dubbing Vader's dialogue in post-production because Prowse's strong West Country accent was deemed unsuitable for the role by director George Lucas.
